full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN MA SGROL MA LA BRTEN PA'I GA-YUL BZLOG BYA BA NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B SGROL MA GA-YUL MDOS KYI PHYAG LEN DU MKHO BA'I MCHOD GTOR NAM RGYAD GZUGS 'GROS SOGS MING SMOS PA DANG, KHANG PA SOGS KYI BYED TSUL YI GE DANG, BRIS SU BKOD PA 'DI NI, PHYAG RDOR AER TE NI NO YON CHOS RJE'I GSUNG GIS SGROL MA GA-YUL MDOS KYI LAG LEN DGOS CHA SOGS BYED TSUL BSGRIGS GSUNG BAS, PHYAG THOGS SEL PHYIR TZAM DU, ^CHOS RJE'I THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN BDAG GIS BSGRIGS PA LA, MKHAS RNAMS KHREL BA MED PAR BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, YI GE PA NI SHE TAR PI LIG THU THON DBU MDZAD BLO BZANG RIG GROL LO, ,SGROL MA GA-YUL BZLOG GI BCA' GZHI DGOS CHA SOGS KYI THO ZHUGS SO, ,DGE'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,
